# Angular Calculator App - Copilot Instructions

This is a basic calculator app built with Angular and TypeScript.

## Project Structure
- Built with Angular 18+ and TypeScript
- Uses Angular CLI for development and building
- Implements a responsive calculator UI with basic arithmetic operations
- Includes proper error handling and decimal number support

## Development Guidelines
- Follow Angular best practices and style guide
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement reactive programming patterns where appropriate
- Keep components focused and maintainable
- Use Angular Material or custom CSS for styling

## Key Features
- Basic arithmetic operations (+, -, *, /)
- Number input (0-9)
- Decimal point support
- Clear and equals functionality
- Error handling for invalid operations
- Responsive design

## Commands
- `ng serve` - Start development server
- `ng build` - Build for production
- `ng test` - Run unit tests
- `ng lint` - Run linter
